title: I would like to say 2 things for Syndra

replies.body:
Hey UnknownDestrayon! 

Thanks for bringing this to our attention. I'd be happy to pass this along to the champion team. In the future, to report bugs such as this, please use the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board! It helps keep things a bit more organized. ^-^ 

I think a Dunkmaster Syndra skin could be pretty awesome, although, the Dodgeball Syndra concept will always have a special place in my heart. RITO PLS. :P 

https://38.media.tumblr.com/ff846e5397395304858a0c62903d5b30/tumblr_n6h3w1GMMb1ra6ox3o1_400.gif
Nah, we need Rave Syndra for those bass drops.
Dodgeball Syndra would look awesome. Please make it comes true.
I want her to have this as her dance: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g1UO6X0KRjc
